bio.en:
Contact : dario.rodighiero[AT]sciences-po.fr

Designer, librarian and passionate about art. Currently an interaction designer for AIME – An Inquire for the Modes of Existence – a project of Bruno Latour carried out at the Médialab of Sciences Po. After photographic studies he graduated with a Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science and a Master’s degree in Psychology and Visual Communication with a thesis on thesauri.

Previously he joined as researcher the European Commission’s Joint Research Centre and the University of Milan-Bicocca, collaborated with the XEROX Research Centre Europe, the INRIA Saclay in France; FAO, the Central National Library of Florence and the Domus Academy in Italy; the Fraunhofer in Germany; the British Geological Survey in England.
